translations.INVITATION_EMAIL_SUBJECT: You've been invited to exchange cloud IDs.
translations.HANDLE_INVITATION_ALREADY_ACCEPTED: Remote user %s is already known by the system. You can share data already.
translations.HANDLE_INVITATION_EXISTS: This invitation has been dealt with already. The status of the invitation is: %s. If needed you can request the sender for a new invitation, or send one yourself.
translations.GET_INVITE_ERROR: Could not handle the invitation. An error has occurred.
translations.notification: You received an invitation from '%s'. Click to view.
